title: HUD and ither icon are too big AGAIN after maintenance last night
body: HUD, summs icon above minimap, item shop. and many other thing became bigger after maintenance last night. same thing happen after 8.11 patch and gone after a few days, now its back again....

replies.body: On the right of the shop search bar are 2 little icons, you can use those to edit the size and listing of the items. Everything else can be scaled down in the Interface tab in the settings menu.
